CREATE TABLE application.storys_users_comments( id bigserial NOT NULL, user_id bigint NOT NULL, story_id bigint NOT NULL, comment text NOT NULL, dateComment timestamp NOT NULL, del boolean NOT NULL default false,
CONSTRAINT storys_users_comments_story_fk FOREIGN KEY (story_id) REFERENCES application.story (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT storys_users_comments_user_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES application.users (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )
